Known Issues
************

.. contents:: Table of Contents

Updating Workflow
-----------------
* When you edit the process nodes, the workflow doesnâ€™t instantly update itself. You need to refresh the page to see the updated version of the pipeline.
* Similarly, when you update the process nodes, you need to refresh the pipeline page before submitting your run.

File Upload
-----------
File upload module gives error when connection is not stable.
